data.title: Le Tigre Tickets - Tour Dates
data.meta_description: Buy Le Tigre tickets at Event Tickets Center. View all Le Tigre tour dates with interactive seating maps. Huge selection of tickets backed by our 100% Buyer Guarantee.
data.text:
Le Tigre Tickets and Information

Currently, we do not have any tickets available for Le Tigre. However, we expect them to announce a tour soon, and Event Tickets Center will be your place to buy tickets. In the meantime, listen to some of their most popular music via the playlist below and read up on some of their background and biggest achievements. You can also browse similar artists such as Bikini Kill, The Breeders, L7, and Ladytron and check back soon to buy Le Tigre tickets!

Who is Le Tigre?

Le Tigre is a band from New York that has reached mainstream status across the Alternative, Hip-Hop/Rap, and Rock categories. Le Tigre has released 5 live and studio albums and 3 singles on Spotify that string all the way back to Jan 11, 1999 with their debut album titled Le Tigre. Their most recent album release was Le Tigre Live! on Mar 13, 2012.

Le Tigre's Popularity

Le Tigre's growth has led to an overall artist ranking of 7,712 on Spotify in the United States. They have become well known for their exciting shows and entertaining performances which has built a robust following. This is largely fueled by over 2,000,000 listeners and more than 400,000 followers on Spotify, but they also reach an additional tens of millions of listeners on Spotify through playlists. Additionally, Le Tigre has a robust following on social media with nearly 50,000 followers on Instagram. They average over 2,000,000 videos on YouTube and their top video on TikTok has hundreds of millions of views on the social media platform. There are also nearly 200,000 posts on Tik Tok with Le Tigre's tracks featured on them. Le Tigre is most listened to in Los Angeles in the United States.When you attend your next Le Tigre show, it will be easy to see why they have built such a large following.

Le Tigre as an Artist

You likely recognize Le Tigre by their top tracks which include "Deceptacon", "Eau D'bedroom Dancing", and "Phanta". You might also listen to Le Tigre due to their earliest albums such as Le Tigre, From the Desk of Mr. Lady, and Feminist Sweepstakes, but you may have heard of them from similar artists such as Hole, Bikini Kill, and The Breeders.

Le Tigre's Music Library

Le Tigre has released a total of 5 albums on Spotify and is the main or feature artist on 128 tracks. Their full discography can be found in the charts below, as well as their top 10 songs. However, when you attend a Le Tigre show, you're sure to hear more than a few of their big hits from their top albums which include Le Tigre, From the Desk of Mr. Lady, and Feminist Sweepstakes. Their most recent album, Le Tigre Live! was released on Mar 13, 2012. To supplement their albums, Le Tigre has released 3 singles on Spotify. Their top singles, which will more than likely be included in their setlists, are Hot Topic (41 Small Stars Remix) by DJ Ham and Cheese on Rye, Remix, and TKO, with their most recent single, TKO, being released on Jan 1, 2004.
